1 cup whole milk,1/4 cup granulated sugar,1 (1/4-ounce) active dry yeast,4 cups all-purpose flour,2 large eggs,1/3 cup unsalted butter,1 teaspoon kosher salt,2 teaspoons grated lemon zest, divided,1 3/4 cups strawberry preserves,3/4 cup cheesecake filling,1/3 cup lemon curd,1 tablespoon lemon juice,,
